title: Lilacthrow123
author: Lilacthrow123
created_time: July 01, 2022, 07:47:23 PMLast edit: July 01, 2022, 08:01:27 PM by Lilacthrow123
content: I don’t know why a moderator on my last thread here posted it’s been resolved when it has not. As of now I’ve received nothing on rocketpots end. I was unable to reply to original thread so sorry for making this new one. Please refer to https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404841.0 for now. Thanks guys

comments.author: STT
comments.body: I would advice use of full screenshots if possible, having the entire context of the game and platform visible adds credibility.   Also normally threads like this should go into reputation of scam accusations like your original thread though I dont blame you for trying to raise awareness of your situation.   If anyone had similar problems they should come forward to give details especially if it was resolved hopefully.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Your still open thread is here, the reason why that happened is because you created a similar thread on the same board (which will only result in the same answer from other members). If you don't know, here is a link to your topic historySorry to say, your current opponent is rocketpot.io and not this forum. Even if you mean to force rocketpot to pay your money, over-creating new threads will only get you into trouble. Just focus on one thread, post all the updates in that thread. I think other members will be more comfortable following your case that way.Good luck.

comments.author: rodskee
